name: Douche Bag Newz
description: a Douche bag news anchor tries to get through a news cast without making an emotional mistake. News articles can be delivered in many ways, each way affects the way we perceive the content of said news article. Step into the role of a news anchor who has to choose the correct emotion for each news article he delivers. Can you choose the right emotion in time? can you keep up with the dredded teleprompter as you rating keeps going down? Instructions: - Pictures of the news article will appear in the upper right corner of the screen - Choose the correct emotion at the bottom left corner of the screen (happy/sad) - Watch the rating at the top left corner if it goes under 35% you're out!
